paragraphs.title: FPS Total Report
FPS Inbound Volumes
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select "report_group" as "Type", sum("credit_count") as "Volume of Credits", sum("debit_count") as "Volume of Debits", sum("credit_amount") as "Credit value", sum("debit_amount") as "Debit value",  sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count") as "Volume Total",  sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount") as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" not in ('RJCT', 'REV') AND "direction" = 'I' ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery} group by "report_group"

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: FPS Total Other Exceptions
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(phoenix)
select "report_group" as "Type", sum("credit_count") as "Volume of Credits", sum("debit_count") as "Volume of Debits", sum("credit_amount") as "Credit value", sum("debit_amount") as "Debit value",  sum("credit_count") + sum("debit_count") as "Volume Total",  sum("credit_amount") - sum("debit_amount") as "Total value" from "FPS_REPORT_TOTAL" WHERE "report_group" in ('RJCT', 'REV')  ${searchFPSTotalReportQuery} group by "report_group","direction"
